description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原国家级副职领导人，曾任中共中央政治局委员兼上海市委书记。他在主政上海期间，推动了多项重大工程建设和经济发展。2006年因涉及上海社保基金案被免职，2008年被判处有期徒刑18年。
description.en: A Chinese politician and former state-level vice leader, who served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee. During his tenure in Shanghai, he promoted several major engineering projects and economic development. He was dismissed in 2006 for his involvement in the Shanghai social security fund case and was sentenced to 18 years in prison in 2008.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，陈良宇曾担任其委员。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China, of which Chen Liangyu was once a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。陈良宇在担任中共中央政治局委员及上海市委书记期间，胡锦涛是中共中央总书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. During Chen Liangyu's tenure as a member of the Politburo and Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, Hu Jintao was the General Secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党上海市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党上海市委员会
en: Shanghai Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关。陈良宇曾在此长期担任副书记及书记职务。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai. Chen Liangyu served here for a long time as Deputy Secretary and Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高国家行政机关。陈良宇曾担任该机构的市长及常务副市长。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of Shanghai. Chen Liangyu served as its Mayor and Executive Vice Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陈良宇的前任中共上海市委书记，后升任中共中央政治局常委。陈良宇曾担任其秘书。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Chen Liangyu's predecessor as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, who was later promoted to the Politburo Standing Committee. Chen Liangyu once served as his secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾接替陈良宇代理上海市委书记，也是陈良宇的上海市市长职务继任者。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Chen Liangyu as acting Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee and also succeeded him as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国最高领导人。在韩正代理之后，正式接任了因社保案下台的陈良宇的中共上海市委书记职务。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the current paramount leader of China. After Han Zheng's acting tenure, he formally took over as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee, succeeding Chen Liangyu who stepped down due to the social security fund scandal.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，陈良宇的前任上海市市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, Chen Liangyu's predecessor as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市，陈良宇的出生地及主要政治生涯所在地。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace and main location of Chen Liangyu's political career.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的父亲，是一名高级工程师。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's father, a senior engineer.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的母亲。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's mother.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的妻子。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's wife.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的儿子。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's son.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的二弟。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's second younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的三弟。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's third younger brother.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军后勤工程学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军后勤工程学院

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇的母校，他在此学习建筑工程专业。
description.en: Chen Liangyu's alma mater, where he studied architectural engineering.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国的大学。陈良宇曾于1992年作为上海市级储备干部在此进修公共政策。
description.en: A university in the United Kingdom. Chen Liangyu studied public policy here in 1992 as a reserve cadre from Shanghai.

zh-cn: 陈良宇同志严重违纪问题

description.zh-cn: 指2006年爆发的，涉及上海社会保障基金挪用等一系列问题的政治事件，最终导致时任中共中央政治局委员、上海市委书记陈良宇被免职、查办和判刑。
description.en: Refers to the political incident that broke out in 2006, involving the misappropriation of Shanghai's social security fund and other issues, which ultimately led to the dismissal, investigation, and sentencing of Chen Liangyu, then a member of the Politburo and Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee.

nodes.id: 天津市第二中级人民法院

zh-cn: 天津市第二中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 审判陈良宇案件的法院，于2008年4月11日以受贿罪、滥用职权罪判处陈良宇有期徒刑18年。
description.en: The court that tried Chen Liangyu's case, sentencing him to 18 years in prison on April 11, 2008, for bribery and abuse of power.

description.zh-cn: 在中国上海市举行的一届世界博览会。陈良宇在任期间积极谋划上海获得其主办权并推动筹办工作。
description.en: A World Expo held in Shanghai, China. During his tenure, Chen Liangyu actively planned for Shanghai to win the bid and promoted the preparatory work.

nodes.id: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

zh-cn: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆首个自由贸易区项目。其规划方案最早在陈良宇主政上海期间开始探索和酝酿。
description.en: The first pilot free trade zone project in mainland China. Its planning scheme was first explored and conceived during Chen Liangyu's tenure in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 指政府对国民经济的总体运行和发展进行调节和控制的政策。时任总理温家宝推行的宏观调控政策与陈良宇在上海的经济发展思路产生严重冲突，成为陈良宇遭罢黜的诱因之一。
description.en: Refers to the government's policy of regulating and controlling the overall operation and development of the national economy. The macroeconomic control policies implemented by then-Premier Wen Jiabao severely conflicted with Chen Liangyu's economic development ideas in Shanghai, becoming one of the triggers for his downfall.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。因推行宏观调控政策与时任上海市委书记的陈良宇产生矛盾，陈良宇曾公开抵制该政策。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He came into conflict with then-Shanghai Party Secretary Chen Liangyu over the implementation of macroeconomic control policies, which Chen publicly resisted.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共上海市委书记。因陈良宇于1992年冲撞邓小平警卫一事，吴邦国曾在电话中训斥陈良宇。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee. Wu Bangguo reprimanded Chen Liangyu over the phone for an incident in 1992 where Chen clashed with Deng Xiaoping's security detail.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体核心。1992年南巡期间，陈良宇曾因不知情而冲撞其在上海下榻处的警卫。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the core of the second generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership. During his southern tour in 1992, Chen Liangyu unknowingly clashed with his security detail at his accommodation in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 上海市黄浦区的行政管理机关，陈良宇曾担任该区区长。
description.en: The administrative body of Huangpu District, Shanghai, where Chen Liangyu once served as District Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，后因腐败问题落马。有说法称其曾参与策划扳倒陈良宇。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was later disgraced due to corruption. It is alleged that he was involved in the plot to bring down Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，后因腐败问题落马。有说法称其曾与令计划联手扳倒陈良宇。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was later disgraced due to corruption. It is alleged that he collaborated with Ling Jihua to bring down Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治职务级别，陈良宇在担任中共中央政治局委员后达到此级别。
description.en: A rank in the Chinese political hierarchy. Chen Liangyu reached this level after becoming a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于2002年11月在中共十六届一中全会上当选为中央政治局委员，直至2006年9月因社保案被停止职务。
description.en: Chen Liangyu was elected as a member of the Politburo at the First Plenary Session of the 16th CPC Central Committee in November 2002, and held the position until he was suspended in September 2006 due to the social security fund case.

relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于2002年10月接替黄菊出任中共上海市委书记，直至2006年9月被免职。
description.en: Chen Liangyu succeeded Huang Ju as Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee in October 2002 and held the post until his dismissal in September 2006.

relationships.target: 中国共产党上海市委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇自1992年12月起长期担任中共上海市委副书记。
description.en: Chen Liangyu served as Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee for a long period starting from December 1992.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于2001年12月任上海市代市长，2002年2月正式当选市长，任职至2003年2月。
description.en: Chen Liangyu became acting mayor of Shanghai in December 2001, was formally elected mayor in February 2002, and served until February 2003.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于1996年被任命为上海市常务副市长。
description.en: Chen Liangyu was appointed as the Executive Vice Mayor of Shanghai in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于1987年4月被任命为上海市黄浦区区长。
description.en: Chen Liangyu was appointed as the Mayor of Huangpu District, Shanghai in April 1987.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇自2002年11月当选中共中央政治局委员后，成为国家级副职领导人，直至2006年9月被停止职务。
description.en: After being elected as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee in November 2002, Chen Liangyu became a state-level vice leader until he was suspended from his duties in September 2006.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于1946年10月24日出生于上海市。
description.en: Chen Liangyu was born in Shanghai on October 24, 1946.

description.zh-cn: 黄毅玲是陈良宇的妻子。
description.en: Huang Yiling is Chen Liangyu's wife.

description.zh-cn: 陈更华是陈良宇的父亲。
description.en: Chen Genghua is Chen Liangyu's father.

description.zh-cn: 李谋真是陈良宇的母亲。
description.en: Li Mouzhen is Chen Liangyu's mother.

description.zh-cn: 陈维力是陈良宇的儿子。
description.en: Chen Weili is Chen Liangyu's son.

description.zh-cn: 陈良亚是陈良宇的二弟。
description.en: Chen Liangya is Chen Liangyu's second younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 陈良军是陈良宇的三弟。
description.en: Chen Liangjun is Chen Liangyu's third younger brother.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军后勤工程学院

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于1963年至1968年在解放军后勤工程学院建筑系结构专业学习。
description.en: Chen Liangyu studied in the Structural Engineering program of the Department of Architecture at the PLA University of Logistics from 1963 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇于1992年作为上海市级储备干部被派往英国伯明翰大学公共政策学院进修。
description.en: In 1992, Chen Liangyu was sent to the School of Public Policy at the University of Birmingham in the UK for advanced study as a reserve cadre from Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 1992年10月，陈良宇进入上海市委，任上海市委副秘书长，成为时任上海市长黄菊的秘书。
description.en: In October 1992, Chen Liangyu joined the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee as Deputy Secretary-General, becoming the secretary to then-Mayor of Shanghai, Huang Ju.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇反对并抵制时任总理温家宝推行的宏观调控政策，认为这将令中国错过发展机遇，并要求温家宝为此负上政治责任，两人在经济路线上存在严重分歧。
description.en: Chen Liangyu opposed and resisted the macroeconomic control policies promoted by then-Premier Wen Jiabao, believing they would cause China to miss development opportunities and demanding that Wen take political responsibility. The two had serious disagreements on economic policy.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇在上海主政期间，谋划上海获得2010年世界博览会的主办权并努力推动相关筹办工作。
description.en: During his tenure in Shanghai, Chen Liangyu planned for the city to win the bid for the 2010 World Expo and actively promoted the related preparatory work.

relationships.target: 中国（上海）自由贸易试验区

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆首个自由贸易区项目——上海自贸区的规划方案，是在陈良宇在任期间开始探索和酝酿的。
description.en: The planning scheme for the Shanghai Pilot Free Trade Zone, the first of its kind in mainland China, was first explored and conceived during Chen Liangyu's tenure.

description.zh-cn: 因上海社保基金案（陈良宇事件），陈良宇被免去所有职务并被立案审查，最终被判刑18年，其政治生涯就此终结。
description.en: Due to the Shanghai social security fund case (the Chen Liangyu Incident), Chen was removed from all his posts, investigated, and ultimately sentenced to 18 years in prison, ending his political career.

relationships.source: 天津市第二中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 以受贿罪、滥用职权罪两项罪名判处陈良宇有期徒刑18年。
description.en: Sentenced Chen Liangyu to 18 years in prison for bribery and abuse of power.

description.zh-cn: 时任总理温家宝推行的宏观调控政策与陈良宇在上海的经济发展思路产生冲突，陈良宇对此予以抵制，这被视为其遭罢黜的诱因之一，阻碍了其政治生涯。
description.en: The macroeconomic control policies promoted by then-Premier Wen Jiabao conflicted with Chen Liangyu's economic development ideas in Shanghai. Chen's resistance to these policies was seen as one of the reasons for his downfall, thus obstructing his political career.

description.zh-cn: 根据张炎夏教授的说法，令计划曾参与策划并操盘整倒陈良宇。
description.en: According to Professor Zhang Yanxia, Ling Jihua participated in planning and orchestrating the downfall of Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 有说法称，薄熙来曾与令计划联手扳倒陈良宇。
description.en: It is alleged that Bo Xilai collaborated with Ling Jihua to bring down Chen Liangyu.

description.zh-cn: 1992年初，因陈良宇无意中冲撞了邓小平在上海下榻处的警卫，时任中共上海市委书记吴邦国在电话中训斥了陈良宇。
description.en: In early 1992, after Chen Liangyu inadvertently clashed with the security detail at Deng Xiaoping's residence in Shanghai, then-Shanghai Party Secretary Wu Bangguo reprimanded Chen over the phone.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇被免职后，韩正代理其上海市委书记职务。此前，韩正接替陈良宇出任上海市市长。
description.en: After Chen Liangyu was dismissed, Han Zheng served as acting Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee. Previously, Han had succeeded Chen as Mayor of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 陈良宇被免职后，习近平在韩正短暂代理之后，正式接任了上海市委书记职务。
description.en: After Chen Liangyu was dismissed and following Han Zheng's brief acting tenure, Xi Jinping formally took over the position of Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee.
